QuestData.Title: The Corruptor
QuestData.Description: Xandris has been slain, but there are others that must be dealt with if my grove is to be saved.$b$bDuring the great war, Kagraxxis took great pleasure in corrupting the lands he once called home.$b$bWere it not for the foolish mercy of my fellow druids, I would have slain him myself.$b$bFind the demon and bring justice upon him.$b$bI must entrust this task to you alone, for I sense an even darker presence here... one that requires my personal attention.
QuestData.RewardText: You have my thanks, $c.$b$bIf not for your arrival I would have surely perished here.
